scripts.convert-icons: convert public/icon-source.svg -resize 192x192 public/icon-192.png && convert public/icon-source.svg -resize 512x512 public/icon-512.png && convert public/icon-maskable-source.svg -resize 192x192 public/icon-maskable-192.png && convert public/icon-maskable-source.svg -resize 512x512 public/icon-maskable-512.png && convert public/icon-source.svg -resize 180x180 public/apple-touch-icon.png
